name: Fly To The Beat
description:
Made for the  Mini Jam 85: Gold

Limitation: One-Minute Timer

A fast paced rhythm game where your goal is to stay on a moving line. But you drop your gold if you don't touch the line. Survive 60 seconds to move on to the next level with it's unique soundtrack and graphics. Can you beat the last level?

Download the game for a better experience.

If your are playing in HTML, use fullscreen for the best experience.

Good luck on your journey!
